mechanics.condition: A sanctuary has been previously designated by the caster AND Caster chooses up to five willing creatures within 5 feet of them
mechanics.outcome: Caster and chosen creatures instantly teleport to the nearest unoccupied space of the designated sanctuary

mechanics.trigger: Spell is Cast (as a designation attempt)
mechanics.condition: Casting occurs within a location that is dedicated to or strongly linked to the caster's deity
mechanics.outcome: The location becomes the designated sanctuary for future castings of Word of Recall by the caster

mechanics.condition: No sanctuary has been previously designated by the caster for Word of Recall

mechanics.trigger: Spell is Cast (as a designation attempt)
mechanics.condition: Casting occurs in an area that is NOT dedicated to or strongly linked to the caster's deity
mechanics.outcome: The spell has no effect (the location is not designated as a sanctuary)

description_text: You and up to five willing creatures within 5 feet of you instantly teleport to a previously designated sanctuary. You and any creatures that teleport with you appear in the nearest unoccupied space to the spot you designated when you prepared your sanctuary (see below). If you cast this spell without first preparing a sanctuary, the spell has no effect. You must designate a sanctuary by casting this spell within a location, such as a temple, dedicated to or strongly linked to your deity. If you attempt to cast the spell in this manner in an area that isn't dedicated to your deity, the spell has no effect.
